sentences.en: ‘Good morning!’ the kids replied in unison.
" And everything is gone from me , speech goes , and reading , Leaving the single unison . "
sentences.cn: 澹 然离言说, 悟悦心自足.

sentences.en: " We will, " the brothers replied in unison.
sentences.cn: “ 好, ” 弟兄两个人齐声应道.

sentences.en: 72,000 pairs of hands clapped in unison to the song.
sentences.cn: 72,000双手和着歌曲整齐划一地打着拍子。

sentences.en: Explode outward and upward, lifting your head and arms in unison.
sentences.cn: 向外、向上爆发用力(explode),将手臂与头部紧密和谐地抬起.

sentences.en: For churches not normally noted for their ability to act in unison, today's unprecedented move was all the more remarkable.
sentences.cn: 对于通常无法统一行动的各个教会来说，今天这一前所未有的举动无疑更加非同寻常。

sentences.en: Hong Kong Unison organises a Friendly Parade to promote Racial Harmony.
sentences.cn: 香港融乐会举办和平巡游,以推广种族和谐.

sentences.en: I place myself by him. I touched the keys in unison with his imagination.
sentences.cn: 我坐在他身边, 拨动了与他想象力相契合的琴弦.

sentences.en: In the snow they shifted, now one foot, now another , almost rocking in unison.
sentences.cn: 他们在雪中不停地换着脚支撑着身体的重量, 一会儿这只脚, 一会儿那只脚, 几乎是在一起摇摆着.

sentences.en: My feelings are in unison with yours.
sentences.cn: 我的感情与你的感情是一致的.

sentences.en: So love is inject loyal observant valiant enjoyment yes obligation and unison.
sentences.cn: 所以,爱就是投入,忠诚,用心,勇敢,喜悦,愿意,责任还有和谐.

sentences.en: The sincere anticipation is advancing in unison with you, altogether creates magnificently!
sentences.cn: 真诚的期待着与您齐头并进, 共创辉煌!

sentences.en: The students gave him a rapturous welcome, chanting in unison: "We want the king!"
sentences.cn: 学生们给予了他热烈的欢迎，他们齐声高喊：“我们要国王！”

sentences.en: The two firms may join and act in unison.
sentences.cn: 两个企业联合起来,协调行动.

sentences.en: They ran together, their legs moving in unison.
sentences.cn: 他们步调一致地一起跑.

sentences.en: Unison 2002 is a deeply coloured Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah blend.
sentences.cn: 2002年尤尼森是由梅鹿, 赤霞珠和西拉子所酿制的,酒色呈深红.

trans.tran_cn: 一致，协调，和谐，共同（做某事），（音乐中的）齐唱
trans.tran_en: if people speak or do something in unison, they say the same words at the same time or do the same thing at the same time
